inclusion.criterion: Angina that affects daily life and work and uncontrollable with conservative treatment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Significant stenosis in left main (LM) coronary artery or LAD branch or left circumflex (LCX) branch>70%
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Severe stenosis (stenosis degree>75%) of three main branches of coronary artery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: (anterior descending branch, circumflex branch, right coronary artery) with need of undergoing off-pump coronary artery bypass surgery
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unstable preoperative hemodynamic status requiring emergency surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Severe emphysema, hypoxemia [post-bronchodilator forced expiratory volume in 1 s (FEV1)/forced vital capacity (FVC)<70% and FEV1%predicted<50% or partial pressure of oxygen (pO2)<60 mmHg or partial pressure of carbon dioxide (pCO2)>40 mmHg without oxygen therapy]
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Old large area myocardial infarction, no viable myocardium based on isotope and echocardiography examination, significant cardiac enlargement, cardiothoracic ratio>0.75, EF<30%, left ventricular diastolic diameter (LVDd)>60 mm, left ventricular aneurysm or severe arrhythmia, prone to experience unstable preoperative hemodynamic status during surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Severe pleural adhesion, chest deformity, or previous thoracic radiotherapy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG and PVD with significant carotid stenosis. He reports occasional dizziness but no prior syncope or sensory/motor defects.
